issue.title: [Python] Parquet s3 tests are skipped because dependencies are not installed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6763](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6763). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the s3 parquet test is skipped on both Travis as ursabot

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6763?focusedCommentId=17394128) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I think this is outdated. S3 tests are now run on a variety of CI configurations.
